statements: DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101 AND student_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE course_id = 100 AND schedule_time <= '10:00:00';
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 101 AND course_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Registrations WHERE course_id = 301 AND student_id = 102 AND registration_date = '2022-01-15';
